tika.dc.description: When space is at a premium as it is for many, growing decent food to eat might seem impossible. "Patio Produce" is about just that; growing delicious, wholesome fruit and vegetables in the smallest spaces. No other book exists that explains sowing, growing, caring, harvesting and cooking the major plant food types with a pot or container in mind. This book is from an experienced and entertaining author who is passionate about enabling people to enjoy and benefit from gardening.
